member.name: T:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.ExportLayout

member.summary: Default. It will export the reports in deafult Layout of the export type.

member.summary: Default. It will export the reports in PrintLayout.

member.summary: Uses the default behaviour of SSRS layering format.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.WordLayoutOptions.TopLevel
member.summary: All child elements are renderd at root level without any layers.

member.summary: Uses the default behaviour of SSRS layering format.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.ExcelLayoutOptions.IgnoreCellMerge
member.summary: Removes the tiny column/row cell merges and does not maintains the actual design layout.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions
member.summary: Contains device information setting properties to define the csv file output.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding of the output file. The default value is UTF-8

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.FieldDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the field delimiter string to separate field in the output. The default value is a comma (,).

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.FileExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSV file extension. The default value is .CSV. If both Extension and FileExtension are specified then FileExtension will take precedence.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.Qualifier
member.summary: Gets or sets the qualifier string which is put around the output result if contain the field delimiter or record delimiter.The default value is a quotation mark (").

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.RecordDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the record delimiter which is put at the end of each record. The default value is "\r\n".

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.SuppressLineBreaks
member.summary: Gets or sets the boolean value which define the line breaks are included to output. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.CsvOptions.UseFormattedValues
member.summary: Gets or sets the boolean value which define the report formatted text are included to the output. The default value is true.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.HTMLOptions
member.summary: To set the HTMLOptions of HTML Writter
member.remarks: HTMLOptions contains the property to define the HideHTMLPageSeparator

member.name: P:Syncfusion.ReportWriter.HTMLOptions.HidePageSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets a value for HideHTMLPageSeparator.

member.summary: Enable PDFA export.
